io.micronaut.transaction.interceptor.annotation

Annotation Type TransactionalEventAdvice


  • @Target(value=ANNOTATION_TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Around
 @Type(value=TransactionalEventInterceptor.class)
 @Internal
public @interface TransactionalEventAdvice
    Internal annotation applied to TransactionalEventListener that allows the interception of methods and binding the event consumer to the running transaction.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    graemerocher
